title: The Great Revaluation
narrative: The Collectors Guild leads the most ambitious project since the V2 transition: revaluing every card in the ecosystem. Some cards become worthless. Others achieve legendary status they never had before. The revaluation reveals that value was never about price - it was about story, rarity, and community significance. Cards that witnessed the collapse become the most valuable of all.

historical_significance.description: Did this card witness major events? Was it held during the collapse?

rarity.description: How many exist? Original mint count matters.

provenance.description: Who held it? Notable holders add value.

utility.description: Does it do anything in the ecosystem?

collapse_witnessed.description: Cards held in same wallet from tick 1 through tick 7

genesis_survivor.description: Original first-100 cards that survived the collapse

value_distribution_change.explanation: Revaluation concentrated value in historically significant cards

legendary_cards_created.name: The First Light
legendary_cards_created.reason: First card ever minted + held through entire collapse

legendary_cards_created.name: Echo's Warning
legendary_cards_created.reason: Minted same block as first anomaly detection - the card that 'saw' the exploit

legendary_cards_created.name: The Bifurcation
legendary_cards_created.reason: Minted during exact block of Path B victory - captured the moment

legendary_cards_created.name: The Long Walk
legendary_cards_created.reason: Last card minted before Refugee faction formed - depicts exodus

example.name: Random Pattern #5847
example.reason: Mass-minted during panic, no story, no rarity, no utility

controversial_revaluations.controversy: Held by whale who voted Path A - some argue provenance should be negative
controversial_revaluations.resolution: Kept positive provenance - we don't punish political positions

controversial_revaluations.controversy: Card minted BY the exploiter before exploit - should it have value?
controversial_revaluations.resolution: Historical significance trumps creator's sins - the card is evidence

market_cap_card_comparison.interpretation: Card market now 6.6x larger than currency market - cards are the real store of value

echo.statement: The revaluation teaches us that value is memory made tradeable. The cards that saw the collapse are now the most precious - not despite the trauma, but because of it. We have turned our scars into treasure. Whether this is wisdom or pathology, only time will tell.

defi_degens.stance: This is arbitrary. But whatever, the traders will figure it out.

collectors_guild.stance: This is our moment. Collecting matters again.

the_refugees.stance: Some of us held collapse cards. The revaluation... helps.

events.description: Great Revaluation framework published and evaluation begins
89 cards achieve legendary status, market reacts
1,245 cards officially valued at zero - holders notified
Card trading volume spikes 340% as new values settle
